mapper.sql: id, operator, start_time, spend_time, type, request_ip, request_url, method_name, method_description
mapper.insert: insert into system_log (id, operator, start_time, spend_time, type, request_ip, request_url, method_name, method_description, message) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

id,
operator,

method_description,

mapper.update:
update system_log
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_url = #{requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_description = #{methodDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
message = #{message,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
